title: Himi 126
lyrics:
M.NG
1.
’Oua na’a ku falala,
Ki he ‘eku ngāue;
Ka te u tuku kotoa pē
Hangē ko e veve.
2.
Ke u fō ma’u pē hoku kofu,
‘I he ta’ata’a
‘O e Lami angatonu,
‘O hoku ‘Otua.
3.
Sīsū ko hoku mālohi,
Mo ‘eku mo’ui;
Mo hoku mālōlō foki,
Fakalaumālie.
4.
’Oku ou tui fai ma’u pē,
Ki he ‘Afiona;
Ke ‘oua ke ke fekau au,
Ki ho katonga.
5.
‘E toki fetongi’aki,
‘A ‘eku tui ni
‘A e ma’a ‘e hā mo’oni,
Pea lelei lahi. *
